stories.text:
How to reproduce:

1. open the Mail app that comes pre-installed in Windows 10.

2. Take a screenshot of an email message where the subject, sender and receiver are visible.

3. Try to attach the screenshot to a MS Teams message.

4. You will see an error stating that the image could not be uploaded.

5. Now take any other screenshot, e.g. a screenshot from Mozilla Thunderbird.

6. Attach the Thunderbird screenshot to a MS Teams message

7. This time, the screenshot will be attached without errors.

So, it seems the best email client to use in conjunction with MS Teams is Thunderbird :-p
